thread.title: Police in standoff with man at Long Branch house
thread.title_full: Police in standoff with man at Long Branch house

author: Rob Spahr and Alex Napoliello | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Police in standoff with man at Long Branch house
text:
Police in standoff with man at Long Branch house IMG_0025.jpeg Authorities have a house on Ludlow Street in Long Branch surrounded. (Rob Spahr | NJ Advance Media for) 
LONG BRANCH - A man has barricaded himself inside a house Wednesday morning in Long Branch, prompting a large police presence including members of the SWAT team. 
Police have blocked off a section of Ludlow Street. 
A woman who lives in the home said the man, who said he was homeless, showed up two days ago asking to rent a room. The woman called police after she heard him yelling Wednesday morning in Portuguese. 
Long Branch police, Monmouth County Sheriff's Office, Monmouth County Prosecutor's and U.S. Marshal's are at the home. 
Alex Napoliello   him on Twitter @alexnapoNJ . Find NJ.com
